headline: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) Initiates Exchange Offers for Old Debt Notes
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) recently announced debt repurchase transactions targeting 10 series of its outstanding notes, potentially influencing the company's total shareholder return of 1.7% over the last month. This move came as broader markets experienced a general upswing with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq climbing. Meanwhile, Verizon upheld its dividend, maintaining investor confidence, although a shareholder proposal on lead-sheathed cables was not approved. Legal challenges from...

headline: Verizon announces private exchange offers for 10 series of notes and related tender offers open to certain investors
summary: NEW YORK, June 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon Communications Inc. (“Verizon”) (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ) today announced the commencement of two related transactions to repurchase 10 series of its outstanding notes listed in the tables below. headline: Verizon Frontline Network Slice now available nationwide
summary: First responders in all major markets now have access to dedicated 5G UW network capacityBASKING RIDGE, N.J., June 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- In April, Verizon Frontline launched its network slice for first responders coast-to-coast in 20+ markets. Today, Verizon is doubling down by launching the slice in more than 20 new markets, officially making the offering available nationwide wherever Verizon offers 5G Ultra Wideband service. headline: Dogs Of The S&P 500 Fetch 11 June 'Safer' Dividend Buys
summary: Analyst projections suggest the top 10 S&P 500 dividend dogs could deliver net gains of 27% to 53% by June 2026. Learn more about the dividend dogs here.
